Instructions for the Next {self.repeat} Rounds

The next {self.repeat} rounds are the same as the previous rounds with one exception - you will now be able to communicate with the other participants in your group. Before the next round starts you can anonymously communicate via text messages for {self.chatDuration} seconds with the other participants in your group. You can use this opportunity to discuss the experiment and coordinate your actions to improve your earnings. You may not promise them side-payments after the experiment is completed or make any threats. You are also not allowed to reveal your real identity. We will be monitoring the chat traffic while you chat.

The length of this round is again {duration}.

If you have any questions please raise your hand. Do you have any questions so far?
